Row.Text: A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.

Receive one [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route. All Trade Routes have +1 Sight and reveal the Fog of War. +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food on all Monopoly Resources associated with TwoKay Foods. All Grocers produce +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Remember that each Civilization may only found [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]one[ENDCOLOR] Corporation, so make sure the benefits are applicable to your Victory Strategy!

Requires a Global Monopoly on [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine, [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] Truffles, or [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a free TwoKay Foods Office in this City, and unlocks construction of TwoKay Foods Offices in owned Cities.

Resource Bonus: [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine, [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] Truffles, and [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus gain additional [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Office Bonus: +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every Global Franchise (up to your Franchise Limit).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Trade Route Bonus: Trade Routes to a foreign City with a TwoKay Foods Franchise increases the origin City's [ICON_FOOD] Growth rate by +10%, and all owned Trade Routes have +1 Sight and reveal the Fog of War.

A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.

This building can only be constructed in Foreign Cities if you were the founder of TwoKay Foods. To construct this building in a foreign City, send a Trade Route from an owned City with a TwoKay Foods Office in it to a foreign City. When the Trade Route is complete, the building will automatically be constructed.
+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold to all Monopoly Resources worked by this City that are associated with TwoKay Foods. Generates revenue for TwoKay Foods Offices in the founding Civilization's Cities.

A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.

When a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route between a foreign City and this City completes, a TwoKay Foods Franchise is constructed in the foreign City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]TwoKay Foods cannot be sold or destroyed by the player, and increases the [ICON_FOOD] Food output of all TwoKay Foods Offices by +3.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You cannot have more Franchises than the maximum of possible [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes supported by your empire.

+2 [ICON_FOOD] Food on all Monopoly Resources associated with TwoKay Foods. +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every TwoKay Foods Franchise (up to your Franchise Limit).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every Trade Route from this City to a foreign City with a TwoKay Foods Franchise increases this City's [ICON_FOOD] Growth rate by +10%.
